prompts: Create a metallic Pokemon that showcases strength and resilience with a powerful stance.
I want a Pokemon that combines elements of technology and nature, appearing sleek and sophisticated.
Generate a Steel-type Pokemon with sharp features and an imposing presence, perfect for a battle.
Make a Pokemon that glows with a bluish hue, symbolizing intelligence and strategy in combat.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a futuristic machine, equipped with armor and advanced tools.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of psychic powers with a cool, metallic shell.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in urban landscapes, blending modernity with natural elements.
